divs: sighting detailswas staying up late saturday night at a west canyon diablo ranch home. sitting around with a friend talking we noticed what looked like an reddish\orange colored twinkling star very close to the horizon. we stood up for a clearer view and we notice this was no star. it was too close to the horizon to be a bright clear star. pulled out my binaculars and saw it was over the rural area of the bird springs community (navajo rez). i could make out the distance ancient volcanic geo-formations in the background. we looked at this glowing light for about 2 mins and then it disappeared only to re-appear immediately (.5 sec, like on and off)to the left of where it was (keep in mind we were looking from a distance of 30 miles away). the distance between the 1st sighting and the 2nd sighting was considerable, about 2 fingers together, arms length in front of me. maybe 1 to 1.5 miles apart. this one glowed\twinkled for 30 secs or so and then disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Leupp
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: star like object glowing in sky over BirdSprings
